attributes.alternativeText: A group of people standing around renewable energy equipment
attributes.caption: A group of people standing around renewable energy equipment

quote.body: ‘Energy is the golden thread that connects economic growth, increased social equity, and an environment that allows the world to thrive.’
quote.author: - Ban Ki-Moon, UN Secretary-General

metrics.valueDescription: Ghanian energy comes from renewable resources
Citizens of Ghana currently have energy insecurities
homes that we have helped supplied with solar panels

accordionSection.title: We’re working to empower Ghanian communities with renewable energy
accordionSection.description: We now have years of experience delivering training, education and community-centred renewable energy projects in Ghana. We run practical and hands-on training programmes in solar energy, energy efficiency and clean cooking across Ghana.
